thread.section_title: Barking Mad Dog Care Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.barkingmad.uk.com
thread.title: Mary and Chris
thread.title_full: Barking Mad Dog Care reviewed by Mary and Chris

author: Mary and Chris
title: Mary and Chris
text:
The wonderful feature of Barking Mad is that Chesney's trots off to his host without a backward glance and comes back a very happy dog as if we haven't been away! That's how brilliant it is - that we can relax and enjoy our holiday in the knowledge that he is safe and happy. We always enjoy the photos and messages too. Thank you Jo for giving him such a super time.
Chris and Mary Ford
